original_title: Their Rancid Words Stagnate Our Ponds (A Missive from the Hinterland)
overview: In a hinterland within the 'elsewhere', a lone character meanders in search of meaning and understanding. Hither and dither doth he wander reflecting upon all things that came before and all things hereafter. The work is a companion piece to Kötting's latest feature film LEK AND THE DOGS and was shot in the Atacama desert in Chile.
title: Their Rancid Words Stagnate Our Ponds (A Missive from the Hinterland)
